actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To designate the week of June 7, 1993, through June 14, 1993, as "National Flag Celebration Week".

summary.text: Declares the week beginning June 7, 1993, as National Flag Celebration Week, which culminates with the observance of Flag Day on June 14, 1993.

titles.title: To designate the week of June 7, 1993, through June 14, 1993, as "National Flag Celebration Week".
